articles.title: Why the AI Revolution Feels Like a Secret: Unpacking the Knowledge Gap
articles.description: Investigate the gap between AI capabilities and public understanding
articles.summary: The widespread lack of understanding regarding AI's true capabilities stems from a complex interplay of rapid technological evolution, abstract concepts, and sensationalized narratives, hindering individuals from leveraging AI for practical problem-solving.
articles.key_thesis: The widespread lack of understanding regarding AI's true capabilities stems from a complex interplay of rapid technological evolution, abstract concepts, and sensationalized narratives, hindering individuals from leveraging AI for practical problem-solving.

articles.title: The Skill Gap Isn't Prompting — It's Thinking
articles.description: Argue that AI literacy is about structured thinking, not prompt formulas
articles.summary: The true skill gap in the age of AI is not in prompting, but in thinking—specifically, in the structured cognitive processes that enable individuals to effectively translate real-world problems into solvable AI tasks.
articles.key_thesis: The true skill gap in the age of AI is not in prompting, but in thinking—specifically, in the structured cognitive processes that enable individuals to effectively translate real-world problems into solvable AI tasks.

articles.title: AI as Cognitive Amplifier, Not Replacement
articles.description: Frame AI as tool for augmenting human intelligence
articles.summary: AI functions not as a replacement for human cognition, but as an amplifier of it, extending the reach of human thinking while requiring judgment, context, creativity, and strategic thinking.
articles.key_thesis: AI doesn't replace thinking—it changes the nature of the thinking work we do, functioning as a cognitive amplifier that requires orchestration rather than execution.

articles.title: From Overwhelm to Decomposition: Navigating the AI Frontier with Structured Thinking
articles.description: Teach problem decomposition as core AI literacy skill
articles.summary: By embracing structured thinking and the strategic decomposition of complex problems, general users can transform their experience with AI from one of paralyzing overwhelm to confident, iterative experimentation.
articles.key_thesis: By embracing structured thinking and the strategic decomposition of complex problems, general users can transform their experience with AI from one of paralyzing overwhelm to confident, iterative experimentation.
